description:
Jonah is a total charmer. From the moment I first met him I was struck by how sexy and contagious his smile is — and he's always smiling! It's always a pleasure when I get to work with someone as friendly and talkative as he is. In fact, he's an open book and not shy about anything.
For you fur lovers, Jonah is going to be a real treat. He normally shaves, but fortunately had decided to let it grow out a little. And man, he's got a beautiful hairy chest and stomach!
title: Jonah
